lead_paragraph: Anand Gupta, the network’s executive vice president of finance, filed a lawsuit asserting he wasn’t given a promotion and salary increase because of racial discrimination.

headline.print_headline: Al Jazeera America Executive Files a Racial Bias Lawsuit
headline.main: Al Jazeera America Executive Files Bias Suit

snippet: Anand Gupta, the network’s executive vice president of finance, filed a lawsuit asserting he wasn’t given a promotion and salary increase because of racial discrimination.
abstract: Al Jazeera America executive Anand Gupta files federal lawsuit against network, alleging he has not been granted assured promotion and salary raise due to racial discrimination.
